name: ghost shooter pro(beta+)
description:
this is the beta version of ghost shooter pro!

a better name and a few audio changes will come soon!

how to play:

WASD/aroow keys to move

left click to shoot

move the mouse to aim space to use rampage time when ready 

how to win:

SURVIVE THE LONGEST

KILL AS MANY MONSTERS AS YOU CAN!

AND HAVE FUN!!!!
